setVelocity(double) - Method in class bounce.logic.Ball
Sets the velocity of the ball.
setX(double) - Method in class bounce.logic.Ball
Sets the "x" position of the ball—that is, the horizontal position relative to the left edge of the drawing area.
setY(double) - Method in class bounce.logic.Ball
Sets the "y" position of the ball—that is, the height of the ball from the ground.
start() - Method in class bounce.gui.BounceDisplay
Begins the animation by starting the timer that calculates the falling objects position.
